alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Covington; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 18 at 3:46AM CDT until March 20 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Alabama, northwest Florida and southeast Mississippi. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Covington; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
